scripts.pack:win32-x64: rm -rf node_modules && npm install --no-package-lock --os=win32 --cpu=x64 && rm -f {node_modules/esbuild/bin/esbuild,node_modules/esbuild/lib/downloaded-*} && vsce package
scripts.pack:win32-arm64: rm -rf node_modules && npm install --no-package-lock --os=win32 --cpu=arm64 && rm -f {node_modules/esbuild/bin/esbuild,node_modules/esbuild/lib/downloaded-*} && vsce package
scripts.pack:linux-x64: rm -rf node_modules && npm install --no-package-lock --os=linux --cpu=x64 && rm -f {node_modules/esbuild/bin/esbuild,node_modules/esbuild/lib/downloaded-*} && vsce package

scripts.pack:all: npm run pack:win32-x64 && npm run pack:win32-arm64 && npm run pack:linux-x64 && npm run pack:linux-arm64 && npm run pack:linux-armhf && npm run pack:darwin-x64 && npm run pack:darwin-arm64
scripts.publish:win32-x64: rm -rf node_modules && npm install --no-package-lock --os=win32 --cpu=x64 && rm -f {node_modules/esbuild/bin/esbuild,node_modules/esbuild/lib/downloaded-*} && vsce publish --target win32-x64
scripts.publish:win32-arm64: rm -rf node_modules && npm install --no-package-lock --os=win32 --cpu=arm64 && rm -f {node_modules/esbuild/bin/esbuild,node_modules/esbuild/lib/downloaded-*} && vsce publish --target win32-arm64
scripts.publish:linux-x64: rm -rf node_modules && npm install --no-package-lock --os=linux --cpu=x64 && rm -f {node_modules/esbuild/bin/esbuild,node_modules/esbuild/lib/downloaded-*} && vsce publish --target linux-x64 alpine-x64
scripts.publish:linux-arm64: rm -rf node_modules && npm install --no-package-lock --os=linux --cpu=arm64 && rm -f {node_modules/esbuild/bin/esbuild,node_modules/esbuild/lib/downloaded-*} && vsce publish --target linux-arm64 alpine-arm64
scripts.publish:linux-armhf: rm -rf node_modules && npm install --no-package-lock --os=linux --cpu=arm && rm -f {node_modules/esbuild/bin/esbuild,node_modules/esbuild/lib/downloaded-*} && vsce publish --target linux-armhf
scripts.publish:darwin-x64: rm -rf node_modules && npm install --no-package-lock --os=darwin --cpu=x64 && rm -f {node_modules/esbuild/bin/esbuild,node_modules/esbuild/lib/downloaded-*} && vsce publish --target darwin-x64
scripts.publish:darwin-arm64: rm -rf node_modules && npm install --no-package-lock --os=darwin --cpu=arm64 && rm -f {node_modules/esbuild/bin/esbuild,node_modules/esbuild/lib/downloaded-*} && vsce publish --target darwin-arm64
scripts.publish:all: npm run publish:win32-x64 && npm run publish:win32-arm64 && npm run publish:linux-x64 && npm run publish:linux-arm64 && npm run publish:linux-armhf && npm run publish:darwin-x64 && npm run publish:darwin-arm64
